metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24889 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in LibRaw version < 20.0 LibRaw::GetNormalizedModel in src/metadata/normalize_model.cpp may lead to context-dependent arbitrary code execution.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> affected code was introduced in 20.0, and is not present in versions earlier than that, contrary to the CVE description See "Hasselblad L1D-20c, X1D II 50C" in https://www.libraw.org/news/libraw-0-20-Release

criterions.comment: darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
